00056 class fdoutbuf: public std::streambuf {
00057 protected:
00058     int fd; // file descriptor
00059 public:
00060     // constructor
00061     fdoutbuf(int _fd) :
00062         fd(_fd) {
00063     }
00064 protected:
00065     // write one character
00066     virtual int_type overflow(int_type c) {
00067         if (c != EOF) {
00068             char z = c;
00069             if (write(fd, &z, 1) != 1) {
00070                 return EOF;
00071             }
00072         }
00073         return c;
00074     }
00075     // write multiple characters
00076     virtual std::streamsize xsputn(const char* s, std::streamsize num) {
00077         return write(fd, s, num);
00078     }
00079 };

00096 class fdinbuf: public std::streambuf {
00097 protected:
00098     int fd; // file descriptor
00099 protected:
00100     /* data buffer:
00101      * - at most, pbSize characters in putback area plus
00102      * - at most, bufSize characters in ordinary read buffer
00103      */
00104     static const int pbSize = 4; // size of putback area
00105     static const int bufSize = 1024; // size of the data buffer
00106     char buffer[bufSize + pbSize]; // data buffer
00107 
00108 public:
00109     /* constructor
00110      * - initialize file descriptor
00111      * - initialize empty data buffer
00112      * - no putback area
00113      * => force underflow()
00114      */
00115     fdinbuf(int _fd) :
00116         fd(_fd) {
00117         setg(buffer + pbSize, // beginning of putback area
00118                 buffer + pbSize, // read position
00119                 buffer + pbSize); // end position
00120     }
00121 
00122 protected:
00123     // insert new characters into the buffer
00124     virtual int_type underflow() {
00125 #ifndef _MSC_VER
00126         using std::memmove;
00127 #endif
00128 
00129         // is read position before end of buffer?
00130         if (gptr() < egptr()) {
00131             return traits_type::to_int_type(*gptr());
00132         }
00133 
00134         /* process size of putback area
00135          * - use number of characters read
00136          * - but at most size of putback area
00137          */
00138         int numPutback;
00139         numPutback = gptr() - eback();
00140         if (numPutback > pbSize) {
00141             numPutback = pbSize;
00142         }
00143 
00144         /* copy up to pbSize characters previously read into
00145          * the putback area
00146          */
00147         memmove(buffer + (pbSize - numPutback), gptr() - numPutback, numPutback);
00148 
00149         // read at most bufSize new characters
00150         int num;
00151         num = read(fd, buffer + pbSize, bufSize);
00152         if (num <= 0) {
00153             // ERROR or EOF
00154             return EOF;
00155         }
00156 
00157         // reset buffer pointers
00158         setg(buffer + (pbSize - numPutback), // beginning of putback area
00159                 buffer + pbSize, // read position
00160                 buffer + pbSize + num); // end of buffer
00161 
00162         // return next character
00163         return traits_type::to_int_type(*gptr());
00164     }
00165 };
